function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discussion of herd immunity as a strategy to reduce infection spread","Impact":"Increased risk of large-scale infection and mortality, especially for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Emphasizing protective measures for vulnerable populations and implementing alternative strategies","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Old age and high-risk individuals","Owner":"Health authorities and policymakers"},{"Description":"Inadequate public healthcare infrastructure in India to support herd immunity strategy","Impact":"Significant risk of shortages in equipment, tools, and healthcare personnel, leading to increased mortality and inability to manage the pandemic","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, equipment, and personnel resources","Technologies":"Healthcare equipment and tools, ventilation, protective gear","People":"Indian population","Owner":"Government and healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Inefficient tracing of infection cases in India","Impact":"Limited ability to identify and contain infection spread, leading to increased risk of transmission and inability to manage the pandemic","Mitigation":"Improving tracing methods and implementing more effective case identification strategies","Technologies":"Tracing technology, testing facilities","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"}]}
